name: concat_ws(string separator,string_1,string_2)
usage: concat two string with string separator
sql_statement: select concat_ws(" ",first_name,last_name) as fullname from employees limit 10 ;
join_statement: select e.emp_no as 'Employee ID' , concat_ws(" ",e.first_name,e.last_name) as 'Employee Fullnameâ€™, s.salary as 'Annual Wage' from employees e inner join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no order by s.salary desc limit 10 ;
